## Fully Open Areas [mkwcat]

Load the entire course at once and remove the screen scroll limits.
This puts the entire course in one big area, allowing you to jump between sections as if it's one big area.
This code can break the camera in certain stages, and may cause actors to not load entirely (see 4-Castle).

This code is for New Super Mario Bros. Wii. Many revisions may be untested.

<details>
<summary>PAL Rev 1</summary>

```hex
C208E428 00000004
39000000 39207FFF
39407FFF 39600000
39800000 7CC903A6
60000000 00000000
C208E43C 0000000C
7C002040 40820008
7C681B78 A0C30000
7C064840 41810008
7CC93378 A0E30002
7C075040 41810008
7CEA3B78 A0030004
7C060214 7C005840
41A00008 7C0B0378
A0030006 7C070214
7C006040 41A00008
7C0C0378 38000000
2C000001 60000000
C208E4B8 00000003
7D034379 3CC08008
60C6E444 7CC903A6
4C820420 60000000
0408E44C 7D204B78
0408E468 7D405378
0408E484 7C095850
0408E498 7C0A6050
0408E7D4 38600000
04064DA0 38600000
04064DA4 4E800020
0406889C 38000000
040688A8 80050094
040688B8 83C50024
040688CC 38C00000
040684E4 60000000
20A099BC 90030AA0
04A099C0 38600001
E2000001 00000000
0408E548 38600003
0408E578 38600001
```
</details>
